resources.string: When we got to the hotel they gave us a map with the places of interest in the city, and they told us that 5 centimeters of the map represents 600 meters of reality. Today we want to go to a park that is 8 centimeters from the hotel on the map. How far from the hotel is this park? \n\nWe are going to make the table with the 3 data and the unknown (“x”), and we will find “x” with the formula that we have just learned:
